patthana17.10:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
patthana17.10:0.3_0: Standing on the bank of the river, the objection of a trainee.
patthana17.10:1.1_0: A trainee doesn’t give rise to the teaching.
patthana17.10:1.1_1: (These six discourses should be expanded in the previous discourse.)
patthana17.10:2.1_0: You don’t have any declared: ‘Formonstrousness is a cause of an adept.’
patthana17.10:3.1_0: Neither has nothing left over, he gives rise to confidence in those without it.
